review: This was the absolute worst product I have EVER received from Amazon, and I order frequently. The product was clearly used, as it was scratched as if a key or knife was taken to it. Also, it had no remote control, just an empty slot where it should have been. I attempted hooking the device up, before realizing the remote control situation, and it was on a green screen that I wasn't sure was normal. Since we ditched cable and promised our children we would buy them a streaming device for their TV, we decided to go to Wal-mart and purchase a new Apple TV from there... and guess what? It was perfect, included a remote, and did not give some funky error message...all for the same price!
